headline: BTIG Lifts Datadog (DDOG) PT to $169 on Strong Competitive Gains, New Product Success
summary: Datadog Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the best growth stocks to buy and hold for 3 years. On July 25, BTIG raised its price target for Datadog to $169 from $136, while maintaining a Buy rating on the company’s stock. The adjustment is based on positive field checks that revealed encouraging competitive displacements and successful new […]
